snippet.title: Galactix (1992) Intro and gameplay footage
snippet.description:
Galactix is a vertical shooter released in 1992 by Cygnus Multimedia Productions Inc. for dos.

This is a nice action game with one of the most epic intro movies for a dos game I had ever seen at the time. "Prepare now, your doom is at hand!" Well, considering how well I play this game it certainly is.
